TLSSocketEvent.as
¶

* * TLSEvent * * This is used by TLSEngine to let the application layer know * when we're ready for sending, or have received application data * Copyright (c) 2007 Henri Torgemane * * See LICENSE.txt for full license information.

 
package com.hurlant.crypto.tls {
  import flash.events.Event;
  import flash.utils.ByteArray;
  import com.hurlant.crypto.cert.X509Certificate;
  
  public class TLSSocketEvent extends Event {
    
    static public const PROMPT_ACCEPT_CERT:String = "promptAcceptCert";
    
    public var cert:X509Certificate;
    
    public function TLSSocketEvent( cert:X509Certificate = null) { 
      super(PROMPT_ACCEPT_CERT, false, false);
      this.cert = cert;
    }
  }
}
